plot: A couple, Val and Lon, on a date at a restaurant start to argue. When the verbal tiff escalates, other diners become annoyed by the fight. But when tensions boil over, its revealed that the couple has a supernatural, and lethal secret.
title: The Spat
plot_es: A couple, Val and Lon, on a date at a restaurant start to argue. When the verbal tiff escalates, other diners become annoyed by the fight. But when tensions boil over, its revealed that the couple has a supernatural, and lethal secret.
plot_en: A couple, Val and Lon, on a date at a restaurant start to argue. When the verbal tiff escalates, other diners become annoyed by the fight. But when tensions boil over, its revealed that the couple has a supernatural, and lethal secret.
